title: nultiple choice question
description: multiple choice question extracted from the telco demo

configuration.polarQuestion: say yes, please, or no, thank you

answers.message: Great. Now I need to know which router you have.
messageList: Great. Now I need to know which router you have.

attributes.CHECK_QUESTION: Do you need to know your router's default login?
attributes.ANSWER_TEXT: Great. Now I need to know which router you have.
attributes.title: Default information.

answers.message: So. What are your routers vendor and model?
messageList: So. What are your routers vendor and model?

attributes.CHECK_QUESTION: Do you need the default username and password for D-Link DI-624?
attributes.ANSWER_TEXT: In this case, the default username is "admin" and for the password, you can leave it blank.
attributes.title: D-Link DI-624.

attributes.CHECK_QUESTION: Do you need to know the default username and password for Verizon 9100 EM?
attributes.ANSWER_TEXT:
For the Verizon 9100, the username is "admin" and password "password".

The password could also be the serial number of your router to improve security. 
The serial number can be found on the label affixed to the back or bottom of your router.
attributes.title: Verizon 9100 EM.

attributes.title: Verizon 9100VM.

reply:
Great. Now I need to know which router you have.

So. What are your routers vendor and model? D link DI 624 Verizon 9100 E M Verizon 9100 V M Verizon MI 424 WR Actiontec MI 424 WR
